resources.string: No Timezones to display. Please search and timezones

Time Zone Convertor

 Add new time zone:

 Go to menu to add time zone.
 (Action bar)Click on the add new time zone icon on the right top of the application.
 Search and select time zone to add.

 Delete time zone:

 Click on a time zone to remove it from the list.

 Edit time zone:

 What is the time in New York when it is 9:00 am in Paris?
 Click on a time zone to edit timezone.

 Widget Help:

 Go to widget launcher.
 Select Time zone converter Widget.
 Select a city to display time in widget.


 What is the time in New York when it is 9:00 am in Paris?
 Click on a time zone to edit timezone.
